description: This file defines a React functional component named RightPanel that presents detailed views and actions for selected entities such as cases or resources in a surgical scheduling management system. It manages UI tabs, buttons for actions like rescheduling and assigning, and conditionally renders details based on the selection type.

methods.name: RightPanel({ selection, onResolveConflict, onAssign, onReschedule })
methods.description: Main React component rendering a contextual right panel with details and actions for selected items.

methods.name: label(t)
methods.description: Helper function that maps tab identifiers to display labels.

methods.name: formatRange(a, b)
methods.description: Formats start and end date-times into a human-readable string.

ctags.name: RightPanel
ctags.pattern: /^export default function RightPanel({ selection, onResolveConflict, onAssign, onReschedule }) {$/
